text: "Lovesong" is a song by English gothic rock band The Cure. It was released on 21 August 1989. It was taken from their eighth studio album Disintegration. It went to number 2 in the United States (their highest placing song) and number 10 in Canada. ==311 version== "Lovesong" was covered by rock band 311 for the 2004 movie 50 First Dates and went to number 59 in the United States. == References == Category:1989 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:The Cure songs Category:Adele songs Category:Gothic rock songs
title: Lovesong (The Cure song)
